file.description: File name part. All files that contain the value of this field in their name match

format.description: format of the date in file, in java SimpleDateFormat

regex.description: regex to extract date substring from the whole long string

possibleMissingYear.description: set to true if it's possible for this file to have missing year in log dates

yearSuffix.description: if possibleMissingYear is true, then this suffix will be added between year and the log string.

default.description: default rule if no rule from the rules field matches
